quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
name: John Galsworthy

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
name: Ausonius

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age.
name: Booth Tarkington

quote: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
name: George Sand

quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
name: Luis Bunuel

quote: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
name: Sophia Bush

quote: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
name: Dylan Thomas

quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference.
name: Donna Karan

quote: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
name: Sharron Angle

quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
name: Betty Friedan

quote: I'm very mature for my age, but I'm also innocent in a lot of ways.
name: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Old age is just a record of one's whole life.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Youth has no age.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
name: George Burns

quote: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
name: Mark Twain

quote: There's a vintage which comes with age and experience.
name: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Just remember, once you're over the hill you begin to pick up speed.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Old minds are like old horses; you must exercise them if you wish to keep them in working order.
name: John Adams

quote: Youth is a blunder; Manhood a struggle, Old Age a regret.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
name: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: The excitement of learning separates youth from old age. As long as you're learning you're not old.
name: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow

quote: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Youth is the best time to be rich, and the best time to be poor.
name: Euripides

quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
name: Aristotle

quote: As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: I will never be an old man. To me, old age is always 15 years older than I am.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: At my age flowers scare me.
name: George Burns

quote: Legend: A lie that has attained the dignity of age.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Old age and treachery will always beat youth and exuberance.
name: David Mamet

quote: 'Age' is the acceptance of a term of years. But maturity is the glory of years.
name: Martha Graham

quote: In age of consumerism and materialism, I traffic in blue sky and colored air.
name: James Turrell

quote: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!
name: Ginger Rogers

quote: I'm happy to report that my inner child is still ageless.
name: James Broughton

quote: The trick is growing up without growing old.
name: Casey Stengel

quote: Forty is the old age of youth; fifty the youth of old age.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: In youth we learn; in age we understand.
name: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Old age is like a plane flying through a storm. Once you're aboard, there's nothing you can do.
name: Golda Meir

quote: Old age and sickness bring out the essential characteristics of a man.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The old believe everything, the middle-aged suspect everything, the young know everything.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Be eccentric now. Don't wait for old age to wear purple.
name: Regina Brett

quote: None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We live in the age of the refugee, the age of the exile.
name: Ariel Dorfman

quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: Confusion of goals and perfection of means seems, in my opinion, to characterize our age.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Makeup can make a woman look more beautiful at every age.
name: Francois Nars

quote: We aren't in an information age, we are in an entertainment age.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: As men get older, the toys get more expensive.
name: Marvin Davis

quote: Age considers; youth ventures.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I must confess, I was born at a very early age.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: There are only three things that can kill a farmer: lightning, rolling over in a tractor, and old age.
name: Bill Bryson

quote: To me, age doesn't make a difference in terms of how playful or fun life can be.
name: Brit Morin

quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: Old age is no place for sissies.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Age is just a number. Life and aging are the greatest gifts that we could possibly ever have.
name: Cicely Tyson

quote: Age does not make us childish, as some say; it finds us true children.
name: James Anthony Froude

quote: Bad news isn't wine. It doesn't improve with age.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Old age and the passage of time teach all things.
name: Sophocles

quote: To keep the heart unwrinkled, to be hopeful, kindly, cheerful, reverent that is to triumph over old age.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: If you love someone, you love someone. It doesn't matter; age, colour, c'mon!
name: Sam Taylor-Johnson

quote: Age is a very high price to pay for maturity.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: Bashfulness is an ornament to youth, but a reproach to old age.
name: Aristotle

quote: If youth knew; if age could.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
name: Joan Collins

quote: Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
name: Anais Nin

quote: American youth attributes much more importance to arriving at driver's license age than at voting age.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: Age is inevitable. Aging isn't.
name: Marv Levy

quote: Fitness has nothing to do with age.
name: Virender Sehwag

quote: To keep the heart unwrinkled, to be hopeful, kindly, cheerful, reverent - that is to triumph over old age.
name: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quote: Everybody is playing games. There are games now for pretty much every age, every demographic.
name: Jesse Schell

quote: Filth and old age, I'm sure you will agree, are powerful wardens upon chastity.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Old age has its pleasures, which, though different, are not less than the pleasures of youth.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: In a digital age, I still love sending and receiving cards, hand-writing notes, and wrapping gifts.
name: Matthew Williamson

quote: The ruling ideas of each age have ever been the ideas of its ruling class.
name: Karl Marx

quote: Dissents speak to a future age.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Surrounding myself with beautiful women keeps me young.
name: Hugh Hefner

quote: Adults are obsolete children.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: The harvest of old age is the recollection and abundance of blessing previously secured.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Hesitation increases in relation to risk in equal proportion to age.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: It's sad, actually, because my anxiety keeps me from enjoying things as much as I should at this age.
name: Amanda Seyfried

quote: You can fake your age or mask it, but the passion that moves the characters has to be real.
name: Victoria Abril

quote: How incessant and great are the ills with which a prolonged old age is replete.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: A graceful and honorable old age is the childhood of immortality.
name: Pindar

quote: Old age is the most unexpected of all things that happen to a man.
name: Leon Trotsky

quote: I will never give in to old age until I become old. And I'm not old yet!
name: Tina Turner

quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
name: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quote: Old age is the most unexpected of all the things that can happen to a man.
name: James Thurber

quote: A man does not die of love or his liver or even of old age; he dies of being a man.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Let age, not envy, draw wrinkles on thy cheeks.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: Middle age is when your old classmates are so grey and wrinkled and bald they don't recognize you.
name: Bennett Cerf

quote: Believe me, that was a happy age, before the days of architects, before the days of builders.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Some age, others mature.
name: Sean Connery

quote: The mind that is wise mourns less for what age takes away; than what it leaves behind.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: It is not possible to live in this age if you don't have a sense of many contradictory forces.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
name: Walter Scott

quote: We're in an age of enlightenment, and we have a choice as a society which path to take.
name: Rhys Ifans

quote: Rashness belongs to youth; prudence to old age.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I'm inspired by people who keep on rolling, no matter their age.
name: Jimmy Buffett

quote: So, you know, I think the age of exploration is just beginning, not ending, on our planet.
name: Robert Ballard

quote: With age, you get to a place where you don't want to knock people out. You just want to give people a hug.
name: Vin Diesel

quote: At the age of 21, I had never even stepped on a treadmill.
name: Nikki Reed

quote: Age has been the perfect fire extinguisher for flaming youth.
name: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: In a machine age, dressmaking is one of the last refuges of the human, the personal, the inimitable.
name: Christian Dior

quote: Another belief of mine; that everyone else my age is an adult, whereas I am merely in disguise.
name: Margaret Atwood

quote: Old age: the crown of life, our play's last act.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: All diseases run into one, old age.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: In youth, the days are short and the years are long. In old age, the years are short and days long.
name: Pope Paul VI

quote: In every country and every age, the priest had been hostile to Liberty.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Exposure from a young age to the realities of the world is a super-big thing.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Age is whatever you think it is. You are as old as you think you are.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Youth is wasted on the young.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Growing old is no more than a bad habit which a busy person has no time to form.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: The age of chivalry is past. Bores have succeeded to dragons.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Mindfulness can help people of any age. That's because we become what we think.
name: Goldie Hawn

quote: Difficult choices, unlike red wine, rarely improve with age.
name: Richard N. Haass

quote: The people who live in a golden age usually go around complaining how yellow everything looks.
name: Randall Jarrell

quote: Age is not important unless you're a cheese.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: What most persons consider as virtue, after the age of 40 is simply a loss of energy.
name: Voltaire

quote: What though youth gave love and roses, Age still leaves us friends and wine.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: I was lucky to move around different cultures at an early age and have experience of different lifestyles.
name: Paolo Nutini

quote: Age is relative. Experience is relative. And I think often intensity is confused with maturity.
name: Laura Marling

quote: The age of chivalry has gone; the age of humanity has come.
name: Charles Sumner

quote: Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: Sex at age 90 is like trying to shoot pool with a rope.
name: George Burns

quote: We're seeing the arrival of conversational robots that can walk in our world. It's a golden age of invention.
name: David Hanson

quote: I am, as I've said, merely competent. But in an age of incompetence, that makes me extraordinary.
name: Billy Joel

quote: Middle age is when your age starts to show around your middle.
name: Bob Hope

quote: I think age is a very high price to pay for maturity.
name: Tom Stoppard

quote: A man knows when he is growing old because he begins to look like his father.
name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: A woman telling her true age is like a buyer confiding his final price to an Armenian rug dealer.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Laughter crosses boundaries of class and age... Humour is universal.
name: Jeremy Lloyd

quote: Twenty-two is just such a random age. It's a little blah.
name: Jennifer Damiano

quote: The golden age is before us, not behind us.
name: Simon the Zealot

quote: For me, love is endless, and love has no age limit.
name: Khalid

quote: Our age knows nothing but reaction, and leaps from one extreme to another.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Youth is the time of getting, middle age of improving, and old age of spending.
name: Anne Bradstreet

quote: For the moment I prefer to be a beautiful woman of my age than try desperately to look 30.
name: Demi Moore

quote: The nicest thing about coming of age is that I can do whatever I like.
name: Cilla Black

quote: Age does not bring you wisdom, age brings you wrinkles.
name: Estelle Getty

quote: We've put more effort into helping folks reach old age than into helping them enjoy it.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: I've gotten to the age where I'm comfortable with just about everything - except getting old!
name: Patty Duke

quote: You just never know when you're living in a golden age.
name: Alexander Payne

quote: Keep in mind that diversity does not just mean black. It means all of it - age, weight, gender.
name: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I've always loved music and was singing from the age of seven on karaoke.
name: Christina Grimmie

quote: Stone Age. Bronze Age. Iron Age. We define entire epics of humanity by the technology they use.
name: Reed Hastings

quote: This is the strange thing: Dancers don't age.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: There's no excuse for fur in this day and age.
name: Stella McCartney

quote: Old age isn't a battle; old age is a massacre.
name: Philip Roth

quote: Middle age is when your broad mind and narrow waist begin to change places.
name: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: The New Age? It's just the old age stuck in a microwave oven for fifteen seconds.
name: James Randi

quote: Old age is a shipwreck.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Chinese people age overnight.
name: Karl Pilkington

quote: If I had one regret in life... it's that I was not more humble at an earlier age.
name: Rick Pitino

quote: Whoever marries the spirit of this age will find himself a widower in the next.
name: William Inge

quote: Nobody escapes age and gravity.
name: Harlan Ellison

quote: Middle age is the awkward period when Father Time starts catching up with Mother Nature.
name: Harold Coffin

quote: I think your whole life shows in your face and you should be proud of that.
name: Lauren Bacall

quote: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
name: Aphra Behn

quote: A man loves the meat in his youth that he cannot endure in his age.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The heresy of one age becomes the orthodoxy of the next.
name: Helen Keller

quote: We have to have a diversity of age represented in Congress, too.
name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: Each age, it is found, must write its own books; or rather, each generation for the next succeeding.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: At twenty years of age the will reigns; at thirty, the wit; and at forty, the judgment.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Loving someone liberates the lover as well as the beloved. And that kind of love comes with age.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: How young can you die of old age?
name: Steven Wright

quote: Old age has deformities enough of its own. It should never add to them the deformity of vice.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I am of a healthy long lived race, and our minds improve with age.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: With age comes the understanding and appreciation of your most important asset, your health.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: No woman should ever be quite accurate about her age. It looks so calculating.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you're old, don't try to change yourself, change your environment.
name: B. F. Skinner

quote: We prefer world law in the age of self-determination to world war in the age of mass extermination.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: We all grow up. Hopefully, we get wiser. Age brings wisdom, and fatherhood changes one's life completely.
name: Frank Abagnale

quote: We're not in an information age anymore. We're in the information management age.
name: Chris Hardwick

quote: My view is that at a younger age your optimism is more and you have more imagination etc. You have less bias.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: The older I grow the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: I knew what I wanted to do in sport from the age of nine.
name: Magdalena Neuner

quote: I often joke that 100 years from now I hope people are saying, 'Dang, she looks good for her age!'
name: Dolly Parton

quote: Every man over forty is a scoundrel.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: He who has not the spirit of this age, has all the misery of it.
name: Voltaire

quote: Alas, after a certain age every man is responsible for his face.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The arrogance of age must submit to be taught by youth.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: I don't need you to remind me of my age. I have a bladder to do that for me.
name: Stephen Fry

quote: Privacy is one of the biggest problems in this new electronic age.
name: Andy Grove

quote: Old age is not a matter for sorrow. It is matter for thanks if we have left our work done behind us.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The first crocodile I ever caught was at nine years of age, and it was a rescue.
name: Steve Irwin

quote: When it comes to age, I just feel like puberty is, like, the most horrible time of anyone's life.
name: Sam Smith

quote: By Time and Age full many things are taught.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Whether you are just entering the workforce or nearing retirement age, planning for the future is critical.
name: Ron Lewis

quote: Looking back, I realise I had to grow up and be responsible at a very tender age.
name: Andie MacDowell

quote: The golden age has not passed; it lies in the future.
name: Paul Signac

quote: The love story for me was the nature of the love and not the age of the lovers.
name: Kate Capshaw

quote: Publishing is in a kind of Jurassic age.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: What Youth deemed crystal, Age finds out was dew.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Old age comes on suddenly, and not gradually as is thought.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Most of the basic material a writer works with is acquired before the age of fifteen.
name: Willa Cather

quote: In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.
name: Josh Billings

quote: I think love can happen at any age... it has no age.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: The credit of advancing science has always been due to individuals and never to the age.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It is not how old you are, but how you are old.
name: Jules Renard

quote: Not to expose your true feelings to an adult seems to be instinctive from the age of seven or eight onwards.
name: George Orwell

quote: With age comes common sense and wisdom.
name: Nas

quote: There's no such thing as old age. I'm no different now than I was 50 years ago. I'm just having more fun.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Wives are young men's mistresses, companions for middle age, and old men's nurses.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The age of innocent faith in science and technology may be over.
name: Barry Commoner

quote: Minds ripen at very different ages.
name: Stevie Wonder

quote: I'd always tried to resist playing the supervirility thing. I liked showing the vulnerability of age.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: There is nothing in socialism that a little age or a little money will not cure.
name: Will Durant

quote: It's a great thing to live in a digital age. It's convenient; it's fast.
name: Loretta Lynch

quote: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
name: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: You're supposed to be using your gifts and fulfilling your dreams, at every age.
name: Victoria Moran

quote: The great thing about show business is that there's no mandatory retirement age.
name: Scott Bakula

quote: Love makes those young whom age doth chill, and whom he finds young keeps young still.
name: William Cartwright

quote: An archaeologist is the best husband a woman can have. The older she gets the more interested he is in her.
name: Agatha Christie

quote: Age merely shows what children we remain.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Error is acceptable as long as we are young; but one must not drag it along into old age.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Leadership in telecommunications is also essential, since we are now in the age of e-commerce.
name: Michael Oxley

quote: Age imprints more wrinkles in the mind than it does on the face.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Whatever you may look like, marry a man your own age - as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: Second to agriculture, humbug is the biggest industry of our age.
name: Alfred Nobel

quote: Women lie about their age; men lie about their income.
name: William Feather

quote: It is not well to make great changes in old age.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The passions grafted on wounded pride are the most inveterate; they are green and vigorous in old age.
name: George Santayana

quote: Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
name: Graham Greene

quote: Even one voice can be heard loudly all over the world in this day and age.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: I smoke ten to fifteen cigars a day. At my age I have to hold on to something.
name: George Burns

quote: I think being able to age gracefully is a very important talent. It is too late for me.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: A grownup is a child with layers on.
name: Woody Harrelson

quote: But an old age serene and bright, and lovely as a Lapland night, shall lead thee to thy grave.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: It is so important for people at a young age to be invited to embrace classical music and opera.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: Old age isn't so bad when you consider the alternative.
name: Maurice Chevalier

quote: When you start being enthusiastic about whatever it is you like, that is the golden age for you.
name: Michael Winterbottom

quote: A woman has the age she deserves.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: What is an adult? A child blown up by age.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Temper never mellows with age, and a sharp tongue is the only edged tool that grows keener with constant use.
name: Washington Irving

quote: When I turned 60, it didn't bother me at all.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: A man growing old becomes a child again.
name: Sophocles

quote: I have the problems of, I must confess, old age.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Life, an age to the miserable, and a moment to the happy.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: If you live to be one hundred, you've got it made. Very few people die past that age.
name: George Burns

quote: Retirement at sixty-five is ridiculous. When I was sixty-five I still had pimples.
name: George Burns

quote: As we grow older, our bodies get shorter and our anecdotes longer.
name: Robert Quillen

quote: Even truth needs to be clad in new garments if it is to appeal to a new age.
name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: There are certain age limits on police officers. They'd have retired me out at 65.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: I think there is a lot made out of age, and what age you feel.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: We will not continue to be in the post-'79 era. That age is over.
name: Mohammad bin Salman

quote: I lived the true American dream, because I was able to pursue what I set as my goals at a very young age.
name: Mario Andretti

quote: Keep courage. Whatever you do, do not feel sorry for yourself. You will win in a great age of opportunity.
name: Richard L. Evans

quote: Age is strictly a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
name: Jack Benny

quote: In our digital age, the Golden Rule is not enforced online.
name: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quote: Italians know that what matters is style, not fashion. Italian style does not have social or age boundaries.
name: Stefano Gabbana

quote: A man who correctly guesses a woman's age may be smart, but he's not very bright.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: After 12 years, the old butterflies came back. Well, I guess at my age you call them moths.
name: Franco Harris

quote: There are mysteries which men can only guess at, which age by age they may solve only in part.
name: Bram Stoker

quote: If my idol Mahatma Gandhi could fight to eradicate corruption at the age of 78, why can't I try at 60?
name: Kamal Haasan

quote: Everyone talks about age, but it's not about age. It's about work ethic. Winning never gets old.
name: Lisa Leslie

quote: I am a great believer in naps, whatever age you are.
name: Shirley Eaton

quote: Invention is the talent of youth, as judgment is of age.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: Revenge is the naked idol of the worship of a semi-barbarous age.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: What's a man's age? He must hurry more, that's all; Cram in a day, what his youth took a year to hold.
name: Robert Browning

quote: We are always the same age inside.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: With increasing age, dullness of mind and heart sets in.
name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Intelligent life on a planet comes of age when it first works out the reason for its own existence.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: You know you're getting old when all the names in your black book have M. D. after them.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: No matter what age you are, there's a lot of room for learning.
name: Tony Bennett

quote: We are all geniuses up to the age of ten.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Sure I played, did you think I was born at the age of 70 sitting in a dugout trying to manage guys like you?
name: Casey Stengel

quote: You are the age of your spine. You are as flexible as your spine. That transfers to other areas of your life.
name: Diane Lane

quote: Memory is the first casualty of middle age, if I remember correctly.
name: Candice Bergen

quote: Wisdom doesn't necessarily come with age. Sometimes age just shows up all by itself.
name: Tom Wilson

quote: The biggest disease this day and age is that of people feeling unloved.
name: Princess Diana

quote: The human heart, at whatever age, opens only to the heart that opens in return.
name: Maria Edgeworth

quote: Old age is an excellent time for outrage. My goal is to say or do at least one outrageous thing every week.
name: Louis Kronenberger

quote: Like I said on my bio on my webpage, I was born at an early age, I was close to my mother.
name: Peter Jurasik

quote: You know, from age 17 on, my paycheck was coming from cooking and working in kitchens.
name: Anthony Bourdain

quote: We live in the Internet age. Everyone wants clicks. Clicks are what sells.
name: Trevor Noah

quote: The enemy of society is middle class and the enemy of life is middle age.
name: Orson Welles

quote: Young man, the secret of my success is that at early age I discovered that I was not God.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I've been screaming at the top of my lungs at my family, 'Work out! Work out! Old age is coming!'
name: Cher

quote: I don't feel old. I don't feel anything till noon. That's when it's time for my nap.
name: Bob Hope

quote: The shades of respectability begin to close about the greying head.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: For me, your real age is not the age on your ID. That's just a date when you were born.
name: Jose Mourinho

quote: The surest sign of age is loneliness.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: Ours is essentially a tragic age, so we refuse to take it tragically.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Ours is an excessively conscious age. We know so much, we feel so little.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: No one can avoid aging, but aging productively is something else.
name: Katharine Graham

quote: Age is how we determine how valuable you are.
name: Jane Elliot

quote: Every time I paint a portrait I lose a friend.
name: John Singer Sargent

quote: We in middle age require adventure.
name: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun

quote: We were making the first step out of the age of chemistry and physics, and into the age of biology.
name: Jeremy Rifkin

quote: I would prefer to be forgotten, then rediscovered in a different age.
name: Bill Viola

quote: If I wrote a play with four characters every single one of them would talk like me regardless of age or sex.
name: Norman MacCaig

quote: Responsibility for learning belongs to the student, regardless of age.
name: Robert Martin

quote: By all but the pathologically romantic, it is now recognized that this is not the age of the small man.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Any young man who is unmarried at the age of twenty one is a menace to the community.
name: Brigham Young

quote: Middle age is when you've met so many people that every new person you meet reminds you of someone else.
name: Ogden Nash

quote: I think when the full horror of being fifty hits you, you should stay home and have a good cry.
name: Josh Billings

quote: I've always hated authority from an early age. And authority have always hated me.
name: Dr. Dre

quote: To me, old age is always fifteen years older than I am.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: Utility is the great idol of the age, to which all powers must do service and all talents swear allegiance.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: We put so much pressure on kids to excel in school at such a young age.
name: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: The aging process has you firmly in its grasp if you never get the urge to throw a snowball.
name: Doug Larson

quote: The closing years of life are like the end of a masquerade party, when the masks are dropped.
name: Cesare Pavese

quote: The really frightening thing about middle age is the knowledge that you'll grow out of it.
name: Doris Day

quote: No matter our age, circumstances, or abilities, each one of us can create something remarkable of his life.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: I was a political junkie from an early age; I got a front row seat on something I love to do.
name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

quote: Old age is the verdict of life.
name: Amelia Barr

quote: Whatever poet, orator or sage may say of it, old age is still old age.
name: Sinclair Lewis

quote: One of the many pleasures of old age is giving things up.
name: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: He has a profound respect for old age. Especially when it's bottled.
name: Gene Fowler

quote: At an age when most actresses are being phased out, I am being phased in - with a vengeance.
name: Candice Bergen

quote: Man arrives as a novice at each age of his life.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: There's no such thing as old age, there is only sorrow.
name: Fay Weldon

quote: I was already, I think, at the age of 18, showing signs of being incompetent in the lab.
name: Peter Higgs

quote: You don't stop laughing because you grow older. You grow older because you stop laughing.
name: Maurice Chevalier

quote: It is a free world. It is a dynamic of our new day and age: technology is everywhere.
name: Oscar Munoz

quote: After you're older, two things are possibly more important than any others: health and money.
name: Helen Gurley Brown

quote: Heaven be thanked, we live in such an age when no man dies for love except upon the stage.
name: John Osborne

quote: My age and my phone number are both unlisted.
name: Robert Osborne

quote: I'm probably so out of it at my age that I don't know what people think.
name: Sharon Olds

quote: I'm not afraid of aging.
name: Shelley Duvall

quote: What's a dancer's worst enemy? Sometimes it's age, but sometimes it's the dancer themselves.
name: Karen Kain

quote: There is no age limit on the enjoyment of sex. It keeps getting better.
name: Florence Henderson

quote: Those who have no hope pass their old age shrouded with an inward gloom.
name: Wilfred Owen

quote: Friends die, friends become demented, friends quarrel, friends drift with old age into silence.
name: Donald Hall

quote: We virtually never feel our age, but thinking that we should can lead to disaster.
name: Martha Beck

quote: To be renewed is everything. What more could one ask for than to have one's youth back again?
name: George Lucas

quote: Politics is the one field you don't age out of.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Being seventy is not a sin.
name: Golda Meir

quote: Oh rage! Oh despair! Oh age, my enemy!
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: I'm not interested in age. People who tell me their age are silly. You're as old as you feel.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: We pay when old for the excesses of youth.
name: J. B. Priestley

quote: Middle age is youth without levity, and age without decay.
name: Doris Day

quote: What makes old age so sad is not that our joys but our hopes cease.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Gray hairs seem to my fancy like the soft light of the moon, silvering over the evening of life.
name: Jean Paul

quote: A woman must make her fortune before she is 30; or work after she is 30; or get married.
name: Anna Held

quote: Youth does not require reasons for living, it only needs pretexts.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Middle age is the time when a man is always thinking that in a week or two he will feel as good as ever.
name: Don Marquis

quote: Age is not a particularly interesting subject. Anyone can get old. All you have to do is live long enough.
name: Don Marquis

quote: While one finds company in himself and his pursuits, he cannot feel old, no matter what his years may be.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Age is like love, it cannot be hid.
name: Thomas Dekker

quote: After thirty, a body has a mind of its own.
name: Bette Midler

quote: It is sad to grow old but nice to ripen.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Youth is when you're allowed to stay up late on New Year's Eve. Middle age is when you're forced to.
name: Bill Vaughan

quote: At 19, everything is possible and tomorrow looks friendly.
name: Jim Bishop

quote: With age comes a greater understanding and a greater worldview.
name: Michael Connelly

quote: Forty is the old age of youth, fifty is the youth of old age.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: Matching shoes and bags immediately age you by 10 years.
name: Ines de La Fressange

quote: My notion of a wife at 40 is that a man should be able to change her, like a bank note, for two 20s.
name: Warren Beatty

quote: You should never reveal your true age.
name: Eve Arnold

quote: I played didgeridoo from a young age - on the vacuum cleaner, initially.
name: Xavier Rudd

quote: When a noble life has prepared old age, it is not decline that it reveals, but the first days of immortality.
name: Muriel Spark

quote: Be on the alert to recognize your prime at whatever time of your life it may occur.
name: Muriel Spark

quote: We should bomb Vietnam back into the stone age.
name: Curtis LeMay

quote: The real sadness of fifty is not that you change so much but that you change so little.
name: Max Lerner

quote: I get all fired up about aging in America.
name: Willard Scott

quote: The lovely thing about being forty is that you can appreciate twenty-five-year-old men more.
name: Colleen McCullough

quote: I was very sexual from a very young age.
name: Portia de Rossi

quote: No man is ever old enough to know better.
name: Holbrook Jackson

quote: As you age naturally, your family shows more and more on your face. If you deny that, you deny your heritage.
name: Frances Conroy

quote: The whole business of marshaling one's energies becomes more and more important as one grows older.
name: Hume Cronyn

quote: There is an anti-aging possibility, but it has to come from within.
name: Susan Anton
